Program Information.Program Name: Registered Nurse – Operating Room Perioperative Nursing
Program Information.School: Sally Horsfall Eaton School of Nursing

Contact Related Information: Contact Professor Chelsea Ovsonka at 416-415-5000, ext. 2349 or email chelsea.ovsonka@georgebrown.ca for inquiries about the George Brown College Nursing programs, including Practical Nursing (PN), Bachelor of Science in Nursing (B.Sc.N.), and Registered Nurse – Critical Care Nursing (Postgraduate). The Contact Centre can be reached at 416-415-2000 (TTY 1-877-515-5559) or long distance 1-800-265-2002 for general college information. Mathumesa Muhunthan shares her positive experience with the Operating Room Perioperative Nursing program, which equipped her with essential skills and confidence for clinical placements.
